```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

MAPfreeze.list <- readRDS("/Users/omair/box/VMAC BIOSTAT/DATA/MAP/rawData/MAPfreeze_20201201.rds")

source("setup.R")
source("compute_scores.R")
source("generate_tables.R")

data <- MAPfreeze.list$epoch_2$data$main %>%
  filter(
    map_id == "002"
  ) %>%
  select(
    all_of(np.var)
  )

np.df <- compute_scores(data = data, map_id = "002")

tables.list <- generate_tables(np.df)

options(knitr.kable.NA = "--")
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
for (i in 1:length(tables.list)) {
  cat('# ', names(tables.list)[i], '\n\n')
  print(knitr::kable(tables.list[[i]], digits = 2))
  cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
}
```
